A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've been a Star Wars fan since I was a kid.  I gave TFA a lot of slack because I thought there would be some sort of payoff.  This movie failed to deliver\, and for the first time in my life I can truly say I am not looking forward to the next Star Wars movie.\nPositives : Looked pretty\, soundtrack was okay.\nNegatives : Poor writing/direction.
